Title: Community Interest Companies
Description: Office of the Regulator of Community Interest Companies (CICs) has a clear mission to regulate and to raise awareness of the CIC model throughout the UK.

Title: Forms introduction
Description: Introductory page providing information about the forms held on the CIC site.
Comments: CICs: forms and guidance for applicants

Title: Forms index
Description: List of forms for the different processes involved in setting up and maintaining a Community Interest Company.
Comments: CICs: forms and guidance for applicants

Title: Forming a Community Interest Company
Description: List of forms and related information required for forming a Community Interest Company.
Comments:
html pub

CIC36 word attachments need combining to make another pub (type = form)

Title: Forming a Community Interest Public Limited Company
Description: Collection of links to forms and documentation required for forming a community interest plublic limited company.
Comments:
html pub

CIC36 word attachments will be links to pub (see row 6)

Title: Converting an existing company to a Community Interest Company
Description: Collection of forms and documentation that need to be completed in order to convert an existing limited company into a community interest company.
User need (As a user I want to...): convert an exisiting company to a CIC
Comments:
html pub

CIC37 word attachments need combining to make another pub (type = form)

'A copy of the special resolution(s)' will need to become a pub

Title: Converting a charitable company to a Community Interest Company
Description: Collection of forms and documents required for converting a charitable company into a community interest company.
User need (As a user I want to...): convert an charitable company to a CIC
Comments:
html pub

CIC37 word attachments will be links to pub (see row 8)

Title: Converting an Industrial & Provident Society to a Community Interest Company (England, Wales & Scotland)
Description: Collection of forms and documents for converting an Industrial and Provident Society to a community interest company
User need (As a user I want to...): convert an Industrial & Provident Society to a CIC in England, Wales & Scotland
Comments:
html pub

'the special resolution(s)' will become a pub (see row 8)

Title: Converting an Industrial & Provident Society to a Community Interest Company (Northern Ireland only)
Description: Collection of forms and documents required for the conversion of an Industrial and Provident Society into a community interest company.
User need (As a user I want to...): convert an Industrial & Provident Society to a CIC in Northern Ireland
Comments:
html pub

CIC36 word attachments will be links to pub (see row 6)
